Name: Eliminating viral hepatitis in NYC.
Title: A Local Law in relation to eliminating viral hepatitis in New York city

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Health

Summary: The proposed legislation would require the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene (DOHMH) to develop a plan to eliminate viral hepatitis in New York City by the year 2030. DOHMH would be required to submit the plan to the Council within 1 year of this legislation taking effect.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. The department of health and mental hygiene shall develop a plan to eliminate viral hepatitis in New York city by the year 2030. Such plan shall be submitted to the speaker of the council within one year of the effective date of this local law.  
      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect 60 days after it becomes law, and is deemed repealed after the submission of the report required pursuant to this local law.
